sentence.Network_en: The VC representative and full closed chain of the graph are defined.
sentence.Network_cn: 提出求一个图的顶点覆盖的VC算法,定义图的VC表示式及其全闭链的概念.

sentence.Network_en: Six ? wheel lunar rover is a complicated multi ? route closed chain system, in the view of kinematics.
sentence.Network_cn: 从运动特性上看,六轮月球探测车是复杂的多路闭链系统.

sentence.Network_en: In the end, the presented algorithm is validated by an example of closed chain constraint system.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后通过实例验证,说明该算法具有较高的求解效率与稳定性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 同时要以闭锁链(closed-chain)的训练方式为佳以减少关节韧带的负荷。最简单的动作就是反覆半蹲或1/4蹲。
